h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi
content: Once Elder Jinchi is defeated, you’ll automatically be returned back to the third bell in the Marsh of the White Mist. You can now interact with the Wolf Guai hanging from the tree, causing it to turn to dust, and rewarding you with the Fireproof Mantle Vessel, and 2,000 Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1_Secret-Ancient_Guanyin_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi'.
The content is as follows:
Once Elder Jinchi is defeated, you’ll automatically be returned back to the third bell in the Marsh of the White Mist. You can now interact with the Wolf Guai hanging from the tree, causing it to turn to dust, and rewarding you with the Fireproof Mantle Vessel, and 2,000 Will.
